landing.heroSubtitle: No calorie counting. No willpower battles. Just a proven system you follow for 84 days.
painPoints: Starting over every Monday and quitting again by Friday
Counting calories until you lose your mind, and still not losing weight
No idea what to eat, the same struggle every single day
landing.solutionText: Most diets fail because you keep guessing and restarting. SlowCarb replaces that with an 84-day system: 5 clear rules, daily structure, zero noise. You know exactly what to do every day, without counting calories or starving.
landing.rulesSubtitle: These 5 rules are your foundation for all 84 days. Simple, repeatable, practical.

rules.title: No white carbs
rules.description: No bread, pasta, rice, potatoes, or sugar. No exceptions during the week.

rules.title: 30g protein within 30 min
rules.description: Eat at least 30 grams of protein within 30 minutes of waking up to kickstart your metabolism.

rules.title: No liquid calories
rules.description: Drink water, coffee, and tea. No soda, fruit juice, milk, or alcohol (except on cheat day).

rules.title: No fruit
rules.description: Fructose slows fat burning. Avocado and tomato are allowed in limited amounts.

rules.title: Legumes with every meal
rules.description: Beans, lentils, and chickpeas provide lasting energy and keep you full.

landing.cheatdayText: One day per week you eat whatever you want. This is not optional. It resets your hormones and makes the diet sustainable.

faqs.question: Is this safe?
faqs.answer: Yes. The 84-day journey is built on whole foods like protein, vegetables, and legumes. No crash dieting, no extreme restriction. If you have medical concerns, consult your doctor first.

faqs.question: What can I eat on a cheat day?
faqs.answer: Anything goes. The cheat day is a fixed part of the 84-day journey and helps you stay consistent mentally. Keep it to one planned day per week, then return to the protocol immediately.

faqs.question: Do I have to count calories?
faqs.answer: No. You follow the 5 rules and the 84-day structure. That means execution, not calculations.

faqs.question: How long do I have access?
faqs.answer: You get immediate access to the full 84-day journey and lifetime access to the app, including future updates.

faqs.question: What if it does not work?
faqs.answer: You are protected by a 30-day money-back guarantee. Not satisfied? Email us and get your payment refunded.
